outcome: Technocratic Purists seize control, forcing aggressive system updates across the city.

events.description: Technocratic Purists deploy an untested BCI update causing widespread communication glitches.
Smart devices in homes malfunction, contributing to household chaos and increased frustration.
Public outcry grows as Technocratic Purists deny responsibility for the BCI update issues.
A press conference is held under mob pressure, with factions pointing fingers at each other.
